txt.en:
'Among the scattered homes below, my father's men have stolen supplies and food. The food was taken for his soldiers, leaving the people of Lhan Bach with little to sustain themselves.

'Undoubtedly, my father had the food taken to Lhan Gogledh, which lies on the road to the north. Will you go there and recover it?

'Returning the provender to its rightful owners may go a long way towards convincing the folk of Lhan Bach to take up arms against my father.'
'This food will be distributed among our people, [placeholder]. Thank you for recovering it from my father's men.'
The Dievlig have attacked travellers and even the village of Lhan Bach and stolen food and supplies, leaving the villagers with little to sustain themselves.
The stolen food can be found at Lhan Gogledh, north of Lhucu's hut.\n\nLhucu has asked you to recover the stolen food for the people of Lhan Bach.
Talk to Lhucu at her hut
Lhucu is at her hut, south of Lhan Gogledh.\n\nYou should bring the food-stores to Lhucu so that she may redistribute them to the people of Lhan Bach.
